text: Qizhang is a metro station on the Songshan-Xindian Line in New Taipei, Taiwan. The station code of this station is G03. == Station layout information == The platforms are located underground. Platform 1 is both for Songshan and a termination platform for trains from Xiaobitan. Platform 2 is for Xindian or Xiaobitan. Category:Railway stations in Taipei
title: Qizhang metro station
